docs.snippet: Careful examination of the facts undermines the claims of Donald Trump and his allies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Careful examination of the facts undermines the claims of Donald Trump and his allies.
docs.abstract: Editorial corrects falsehoods advanced by Donald Trump and his supporters at Republican National Convention regarding issue of immigration, namely that country is overrun by foreigners and American people demand some kind of tough-guy response; criticizes those in Republican Party who know Trump's claims to be false yet have done little to correct him.

headline.main: A Few Simple Truths on Immigration
headline.print_headline: A Few Simple Truths on Immigration

docs.snippet: Rounding up some of the notable things that were said at the Democratic National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rounding up some of the notable things that were said at the Democratic National Convention.
docs.abstract: Selection of quotations made during, or in commentary about, Democratic National Convention highlighted.

docs.snippet: Undermining democracies is part of Russia’s plan to extend its influence. The U.S. must push back....
docs.lead_paragraph: Undermining democracies is part of Russia’s plan to extend its influence. The U.S. must push back.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Michael A McFaul, former United States ambassador to Russian Federation, underscores necessity of US finding new ways to promote democracy abroad in order to respond to assault by Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin on democratic values; warns that world is looking to America for foreign policy leadership, noting with dismay empathy Donald Trump appears to have for Putin.

headline.main: How to Counter the Putin Playbook

docs.snippet: Why the liberal mayor of New York was relegated to a minor role at the Democratic convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Why the liberal mayor of New York was relegated to a minor role at the Democratic convention.
docs.abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column observes embarrassingly minor role played by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio at Democratic National Convention; holds that while de Blasio's initial reluctance in endorsing Hillary Clinton certainly played role in his being relegated nearly to background of convention, much of blame is likely connected with perception of him as progressive, and somewhat arrogant, outlier in political world.

headline.main: Headliners in Philadelphia, and Bill de Blasio on the Sideline

docs.snippet: In an ABC interview, Mr. Trump implied that Ghazala Khan’s silence while her husband spoke about their soldier son’s death at the Democratic convention may have been because of her Muslim faith....
docs.lead_paragraph: In an ABC interview, Mr. Trump implied that Ghazala Khan’s silence while her husband spoke about their soldier son’s death at the Democratic convention may have been because of her Muslim faith.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump draws widespread condemnation for criticizing Khizr and Ghazala Khan, parents of slain Muslim soldier Humayan Khan who spoke out against Trump at Democratic National Convention; Trump suggests Khizr Khan delivered entire speech because his wife was not allowed to speak.

headline.main: Donald Trump Criticizes Muslim Family of Slain U.S. Soldier, Drawing Ire
headline.print_headline: Ire for Trump as He Derides Muslim Parents

docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton said Sunday that Donald Trump repaid the "ultimate sacrifice" of a U.S. Army captain killed in Iraq with insults and degrading comments about Muslims, as the soldier's bereaved father pressured Republican Party leaders to distance themselves from the GOP presidential nominee.

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton held a 6- percentage-point lead over Republican rival Donald Trump, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll with new wording that was released on Friday, the day after she formally accepted her party's nomination for the Nov. 8 election.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican candidate Donald Trump said he is unhappy with the dates set for this fall's presidential debates, but White House rival Hillary Clinton countered that the schedule was decided long ago and vowed to show up regardless of his objections.
